Self.Wiki: This map object represents an in-game entity, used for enemies, characters and interaction points that make use of the Talk system.

ThinkParamID.Wiki: The AI parameters this character should use.

NPCParamID.Wiki: The property parameters this character should use.

TalkID.Wiki: The ID of a talk ESD used by the character.

PatrolType.Wiki: The type of behavior used when assigned to a Patrol

FallbackPlatoonID.Wiki: If enemy is not entrolled into a Platoon, it will be enrolled into a Platoon with this ID + 100000

CharaInitID.Wiki: The ID in CharaInitParam determining equipment and stats for humans.

CollisionName.Wiki: The collision that controls loading of the enemy.

PatrolInfoName.Wiki: The index of the patrol info to use.

InitAnimID.Wiki: The animation ID for this enemy to idle with.

DamageAnimID.Wiki: The animation ID this enemy uses upon being damaged.

Option.Name: Return to First Point after Initial Route
Walk from start to end, idle at end
Walk in the general area of random route points, idle for a moment, before moving to next random point
